metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, VXsafetydance has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord Complexity and Chord Progression Novelty and below-average scores in Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: VXsafetydance has sections analyzed in the following keys: D Major,  and B Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
